title: New bonus RP in january a bit unfair for some people?
body: So i checked on the LoL website today and i see the bonus RP thing, but the problem is i thought that if u were gonna do bonus RP sale, it would be on new year and since i didnt hear any announcements, i redeemed my card about 2 days ago or so ago and now i kinda feel a bit angry cause if i were to know this earlier to held my RP card till then, i would have had enough to buy a legend skin, please read this riot

replies.body:
Reds do not browse these boards, you'll have much better luck if you just send in a ticket.

Also I have not heard of this "bonus RP" thing. Probably way too late now lol.
